required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Trial of Teriparatide in Japan
clinical_study.official_title: Assessment of Dose Response of LY333334 in Japanese Postmenopausal Women With Osteoporosis

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to assess the Efficacy and Safety of Teriparatide in Japanese Postmenopausal Women with Osteoporosis.

primary_outcome.measure: To assess the dose response of LY333334 with the percent change from baseline in lumbar spine mineral density at endpoint

secondary_outcome.measure: To evaluate the safety of LY333334

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Japanese women with primary osteoporosis
- Postmenopausal women aged at least 55 years
- Patients with a high risk for fracture
Exclusion Criteria:
- History of metabolic bone disorders other than osteoporosis
- History of any secondary causes of osteoporosis
- History of malignant neoplasm within the last 5 years except for superficial basal cell carcinoma or squamous cell carcinoma of the skin that has been definitively treated
- Severe or chronically disabling conditions other than osteoporosis
